channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 6 vehicles dumped, 14th August
item.description:
All untaxed, most no MOT, many no licence plates. Been here for months. Tow them all away.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Astbury Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Commercial vehicle parked in residential area creating nuisance, 14th August
item.description:
This commercial vehicle is continously being parked in a residential street. The driver leaves the motor running for extended periods making it difficult to sleep, the vehicle blocks light and is not parked in line with requirements for commercial vehicles

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cadogan Terrace, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car badly damaged and abandoned in private parking area., 14th August
item.description:
This car has been abandoned here for many months now. It is in a private parking zone which regularly gets filled up, it is unpleasant to look at, and most importantly has many dangerous parts on it that could cause harm to the kids plaiying outside in the area. Needs removing urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Belcroft Close, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on Amherst Drive near house number 8, 14th August
item.description:
A shopping trolley full of large household waste / construction waste left on the road (not pavement) in front of my car on 8 Amherst Drive by a group of 5 men in an unmarked white van.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Amherst Drive, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree pulled completely down and blocking pavement, 14th August
item.description:
Tree pulled down and broken in half. Blocking entire width of paved walkway and residents having to walk on grass verge or road. Not doable for pushchairs or elderly. Needs removing as a matter of urgency.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Belcroft Close, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Allenswood Road, Well Hall, London
